formulas.description: Returns a 'Valid' or 'Invalid' result based on the MOD 10 check.
formulas.name: AccountNumberValidity
formulas.expression: IF(mod( IF( VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},1,1))*2 > 9, MOD(VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},1,1))*2,10) + 1, VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},1,1))*2 ) + VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},2,1)) + IF( VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},3,1))*2 > 9, MOD(VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},3,1))*2,10) + 1, VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},3,1))*2 ) + VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},4,1)) + IF( VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},5,1))*2 > 9, MOD(VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},5,1))*2,10)+1, VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},5,1))*2 ) + VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},6,1)) + IF( VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},7,1))*2 > 9, MOD(VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},7,1))*2,10)+1, VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},7,1))*2 ) + VALUE(MID({!BankAcountNumber},8,1)),10) = 0,"Valid","Invalid")
